title: Expand question pool and add answer feedback with sound effects

requirements.text: Expand the question pool with significantly more questions for all four categories (country flags, sports, intelligence/math, science/technology) to provide more variety and reduce repetition
acceptanceCriteria: Each category contains at least 15-20 questions
All new questions follow the existing Persian language format
Questions are added to frontend/src/data/questions.ts
New questions maintain the same structure with text, options array, and correctAnswer index

requirements.text: Add visual feedback when user selects an answer: display green color/indicator for correct answers and red color/indicator for incorrect answers before transitioning to next question or game over screen

quotes: وقتیم درست یا اشتباه جواب میدهیم با سبز یا قرمز تو اپ

acceptanceCriteria: When correct answer is clicked, the button shows green visual feedback
When incorrect answer is clicked, the button shows red visual feedback
Visual feedback is displayed for at least 1 second before transitioning
Feedback colors are clearly visible against the existing warm orange/yellow theme

requirements.text: Replace the current background music with a more exciting, thrilling music track that plays continuously throughout the quiz game
acceptanceCriteria: New background music has an exciting, thrilling energy appropriate for a quiz competition
Music loops continuously throughout all game states
Audio file is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Music volume is balanced and not overwhelming

requirements.text: Add a celebratory, encouraging sound effect that plays when the user selects the correct answer
acceptanceCriteria: Sound effect plays immediately when correct answer is selected
Sound is celebratory and encouraging in tone
Sound does not interrupt or stop the background music
Audio file is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated

requirements.text: Add a regretful, disappointing sound effect that plays when the user selects an incorrect answer

quotes: اشتباه جواب داد آهنگ افسوسی چیزی بزار

acceptanceCriteria: Sound effect plays immediately when incorrect answer is selected
Sound is regretful and disappointing in tone
Sound does not interrupt or stop the background music
Audio file is placed in frontend/public/assets/generated

constraints: All new questions must be in Persian (Farsi) language
Maintain the existing warm orange/yellow color scheme inspired by Middle Eastern market aesthetics
Keep the 7-second timer per question unchanged
Preserve the existing game flow: 4 sequential questions, one from each category
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the number of questions per game (remains 4)
Adding new quiz categories beyond the existing four
Changing the game over or victory conditions
Modifying the core UI theme or color palette

required: Exciting, thrilling quiz background music track with energetic tempo, 2-3 minutes duration, seamless loop (quiz-background-music.mp3)
Celebratory, encouraging sound effect for correct answers, short 1-2 second duration with uplifting tone (correct-answer-sound.mp3)
Regretful, disappointing sound effect for incorrect answers, short 1-2 second duration with somber tone (incorrect-answer-sound.mp3)
